issue.message: Optional Modifier parameter should have a default value of `Modifier`
Modifier parameter should be named modifier
Modifier parameter should be named modifier

Overriding `@dimen/m3_sys_motion_easing_emphasized_accelerate_control_x1` which is marked as private in com.google.android.material:material:1.13.0-alpha12. If deliberate, use tools:override="true", otherwise pick a different name.

Overriding `@dimen/m3_sys_motion_easing_emphasized_accelerate_control_x2` which is marked as private in com.google.android.material:material:1.13.0-alpha12. If deliberate, use tools:override="true", otherwise pick a different name.

Overriding `@dimen/m3_sys_motion_easing_emphasized_accelerate_control_y1` which is marked as private in com.google.android.material:material:1.13.0-alpha12. If deliberate, use tools:override="true", otherwise pick a different name.

Overriding `@dimen/m3_sys_motion_easing_emphasized_accelerate_control_y2` which is marked as private in com.google.android.material:material:1.13.0-alpha12. If deliberate, use tools:override="true", otherwise pick a different name.

Overriding `@dimen/m3_sys_motion_easing_emphasized_decelerate_control_x1` which is marked as private in com.google.android.material:material:1.13.0-alpha12. If deliberate, use tools:override="true", otherwise pick a different name.

Overriding `@dimen/m3_sys_motion_easing_emphasized_decelerate_control_x2` which is marked as private in com.google.android.material:material:1.13.0-alpha12. If deliberate, use tools:override="true", otherwise pick a different name.

Overriding `@dimen/m3_sys_motion_easing_emphasized_decelerate_control_y1` which is marked as private in com.google.android.material:material:1.13.0-alpha12. If deliberate, use tools:override="true", otherwise pick a different name.

Overriding `@dimen/m3_sys_motion_easing_emphasized_decelerate_control_y2` which is marked as private in com.google.android.material:material:1.13.0-alpha12. If deliberate, use tools:override="true", otherwise pick a different name.

issue.errorLine1: <string name="dev_mode_enabled">Congratulations, you have enabled dev-mode. Just be cautious.</string>
<string name="url_copied_toast_explainer">Show a toast when an URL is copied by the user</string>
<string name="opening_with_app_toast_explainer">Show a toast when an app that has been set as default for a domain is launched</string>
<string name="resolve_via_toast_explainer">Show a toast when a URL is resolved via an external service</string>
<string name="resolve_via_failed_toast_explainer">Show a toast when an URL fails to resolve via an external service</string>
<string name="enable_linksheet_compat">Enable the experimental LinkSheet Compat menu</string>
<string name="enable_linksheet_compat_explainer">The menu can be found in the sub-menu \"Apps\" and when installed, is able to intercept requests to certain native apps.</string>
<string name="shizuku_manager_start_failed">Failed to start Shizuku Manager, please start it manually!</string>
<string name="include_throwable">Include crash logs (recommended, but can not be redacted)</string>
<string name="unknown_host">%s is either blocked or does not exist</string>
<string name="onboarding_0_subtitle">Choose to always get prompted when opening a link, set default browsers, and much more</string>
<string name="start_setup_explainer">LinkSheet\'s functionality requires custom Android configuration. The following setup will guide you through the multi-step process.</string>
<string name="onboarding_1_subtitle">LinkSheet needs to be set as default browser to handle tapped links</string>
<string name="onboarding_1_card_explainer">LinkSheet can not function without being the default browser.</string>
<string name="onboarding_2_title">Do you want to use Shizuku?</string>
<string name="onboarding_2_subtitle">If you have a lot of apps installed, Shizuku may significantly improve your experience</string>

<string name="onboarding_2_card_explainer">Shizuku allows LinkSheet to disable the default link handling behavior of all apps at once, instead of having to manually disable them for each app individually (which is the next step).</string>
<string name="onboarding_3_subtitle">Link handlers need to be disabled so LinkSheet can intercept them</string>

<string name="onboarding_3_card_explainer">Google introduced verified app links in Android 12, which allows apps to cryptographically proof ownership of domains. This behavior must be manually disabled for LinkSheet to intercept tapped links.</string>
<string name="onboarding_4_card_explainer">Disable link handling for all domains that should be handled by LinkSheet.</string>
<string name="onboarding_5_card_explainer">Basic configuration required for LinkSheet to function has been done - head to the settings to explore what else it has to offer!</string>
<string name="resolve_embeds_explainer">Resolve embed mirrors like fxtwitter.com to the real host</string>
<string name="hide_bottom_sheet_choice_buttons_explainer">Hide the \"Once\" and \"Always\" buttons in the bottom sheet</string>
<string name="permission_required_explainer">Some imported preferences require permissions that are currently not given to LinkSheet. Tap below to request them.</string>
<string name="nightly_experiments_card_explainer">Tap to check out features currently in development</string>

<string name="experiments_explainer_3">Experiments are under active development and may not work correctly, or at all. Please do not report bugs on Github. If you want to provide feedback, do so on Discord.</string>
<string name="theme_enable_amoled_explainer">Use pure black theme if dark mode is enabled</string>
<string name="tap_customization_dialog_text">Choose the action that should be performed</string>
<string name="expand_on_app_select">Expand when an app is selected</string>
<string name="expand_on_app_select_explainer">Automatically expand the bottom sheet when an app is selected</string>
<string name="telemetry_dialog_text">Choose the type of usage metrics you are most comfortable with.</string>
<string name="link_handle_failed_text">LinkSheet can not handle this link as it appears to be malformed. You can edit it below, then try again. Alternatively, you can search on the web.</string>
<string name="something_went_wrong">Something went wrong, please try again.</string>

<string name="reset_app_link_verification_status_subtitle">Tap here to reset the app-link verification status of all apps, then wait a few minutes while Android re-verifies them. You will not receive a confirmation. Requires Shizuku.</string>

<string name="switch_profile_explainer">Displays a button in the bottom sheet to open the tapped link in a (work-) profile. Requires LinkSheet to be installed in both profiles, and manually linked via Settings -> Special app access ->Connected work & personal apps</string>
<string name="settings_bottom_sheet__text_profile_switcher">Displays a button in the bottom sheet to open the url in another profile</string>
<string name="export_log_dialog__text_log_privacy">To learn more about potentially sensitive data in shared log files, tap <annotation url-id="privacy-logs">here</annotation>.</string>
<string name="export_log_dialog__text_log_info">Configure share settings for log captured at: <font face="monospace">%s</font></string>
<string name="crash_viewer__subtitle_app_crashed">Aww snap, that should not have happened!</string>
<string name="settings_main_setup_success__text_linksheet_setup_success_info">LinkSheet is correctly set up and ready to operate</string>
<string name="settings_main_setup_success__text_linksheet_setup_failure_info">LinkSheet is not set as the system\'s default browser</string>
<string name="settings_main_news__text_ui_overhaul">LinkSheet has been given a fresh coat of paint!</string>
<string name="settings_links_amp2html__text_skip_browser">Don\'t run Amp2Html if the app launching LinkSheet is known to be a browser</string>
<string name="settings_links_follow_redirects__text_skip_browser">Don\'t attempt to follow redirects if the app launching LinkSheet is known to be a browser</string>
<string name="settings_app_config__description_native_apps">Apps capable of handling links with this host</string>
<string name="settings_app_config_rules__subtitle_default_rule">This rule is used if no other rule matches</string>
<string name="delete_log_dialog__subtitle_delete_info">Do you want to delete this log session? This can not be undone!</string>
<string name="settings_profile_switcher__text_enable_cross_profile">Tap to connect LinkSheet to its counterpart in your secondary profile</string>

<string name="settings_main_miui_compat__text_linksheet_auto_start_info">Xiaomi is known to heavily restrict apps in unpredictable ways, leading to LinkSheet not functioning correctly.\nTap the button below, then allow the \"Open new windows while in background\" permission</string>
<string name="settings_main_experiment_news__text_experiment_state_updated">Some experiments have been removed and are now the default behavior.</string>
<string name="app_host_dialog__text_no_hosts">No hosts have been set to open by default in this app!</string>
<string name="settings_profile_switcher__text_no_profile">This feature is only available if a (work-) profile has been set up on your device.</string>
<string name="settings_home__text_clipboard_card">Show the current clipboard content on the home page if it is a

issue.errorLine1: Metryki uycia obejmuj losowy, moliwy do zresetowania przez uytkownika identyfikator zwizany z instalacj, a take wersj Androida i s przechowywane w Aptabase (UE). Wraliwe dane, takie jak zainstalowane aplikacje i kliknite linki, nigdy nie bd zbierane. Aby dowiedzie si wicej, nacinij tutaj.

The resource string "telemetry_dialog_text_2" is marked as translatable="false", but is translated to "tr" (Turkish) here
issue.errorLine1: Kullanm istatistikleri, Android srmnzn yan sra kullanc tarafndan sfrlanabilen kuruluma bal rastgele bir tanmlaycy ierir veAptabase (EU)\'da tutulur.Ykl uygulamalar ve tklanan balantlar gibi hassas veriler asla toplanmayacaktr. Daha fazla bilgi edinmek iin buraya dokunun.

issue.message: The resource string "telemetry_dialog_text_2" is marked as translatable="false", but is translated to "es" (Spanish) here
issue.errorLine1: Las mtricas de uso incluyen un identificador aleatorio enlazado a la instalacin que el usuario puede restablecer, as como su versin de Android, y se almacenan en Aptabase (EU). Los datos confidenciales, como las aplicaciones instaladas y los enlaces en los que se hace clic, nunca se recopilarn. Para obtener ms informacin, toque aqu.

issue.message: The resource string "telemetry_dialog_text_2" is marked as translatable="false", but is translated to "cs" (Czech) here
issue.errorLine1: Statistiky o pouvn zahrnuj nhodn, uivatelsky resetovateln a k instalaci pipojen identifiktor a spolen s verz vaeho systmu jsou uloeny na serverech Aptabase (EU). Citliv data, jako nainstalovan aplikace a klepnut odkazy nejsou nikdy sbrna. Pro vce informac klepnte sem.
